name: Google Maps Lead Generator
description: Extract structured business data from Google Maps: name, address, phone, website, email, hours, ratings, reviews, categories, and geocoordinates.
longDescription: A powerful lead generation tool that scrapes Google Maps for business data. Search by category + location (e.g., 'plumbers in Austin TX') and get structured JSON with full business details. Supports pagination beyond Google's 120-result limit. Uses mobile proxies for reliable data extraction. 100x cheaper than Google's Places API ($0.005/record vs $17/1K).
